name: Harmonic Echo
passive: Echo: Damaging an enemy with an ability hurls an orb at them that deals magic damage. This effect has a cooldown per target.
description: Grants Ability Power, Mana, and Cooldown Reduction. Abilities launch echo orbs at enemies for additional magic damage.
tips: Great for champions with low-cooldown abilities
The echo effect has a per-target cooldown
Perfect for poke compositions and siege scenarios
Works well with AOE abilities that hit multiple targets
Good on champions like Ziggs, Xerath, and Lux
